ActSocial Sciences and Humanities Research Council Act
Financial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Designating the Minister of Industry as (1) the Minister for the purposes of the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council Act; and (2) the appropriate Minister with respect to the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council for the purposes of the Financial Administration Act
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2018-1012 of July 12, 2018; (2) designating the MINISTER OF INDUSTRY, a member of the Queenâ€™s Privy Council for Canada, as the Minister for the purposes of the SOCIAL SCIENCES AND HUMANITIES RESEARCH COUNCIL ACT; and (3) designating the MINISTER OF INDUSTRY as the appropriate Minister with respect to the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council for the purposes of the FINANCIAL ADMINISTRATION ACT.
